Name: closable
Description: Defines if close icon should be displayed or not.

Name: closeOnEscape
Description: Defines if dialog should close when escape key is pressed.

Name: responsive
Description: In responsive mode, dialog adjusts itself based on screen width.

Name: rendered
Description: If false, component will not be rendered.

Name: dynamic
Description: Dynamic mode allows dialog to fetch its contents before it is shown rather than on page load which is useful to reduce initial page load times.

Name: appendTo
Description: Alternative to appendToBody. Appends the dialog to the given search expression.

Name: iconStyleClass
Description: Specific additional style for icon, e.g. color. We already provide three classes: portal-dialog-info-icon, portal-dialog-warning-icon, portal-dialog-error-icon

Name: dialogContent
Description: Dialog's content. If you don't specify this parameter, please define dialogContentSection
